410 E Ann St, Weyauwega, WI 54983
Phone 920-867-8800 | Fax 920-867-8815

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

tr.td: Don't forget to call or email to sign-up online for the free breakfast and lunch provided daily for your children during the school closure. More information can be found on the Families Food Service page.

br.strong: NOTICE: FITNESS CENTER CLOSED AS OF MARCH 16

td.span:
The health, safety and well-being of our students and staff are our top priorities. Therefore, the Weyauwega-Fremont Fitness Center
will be closed to the public beginning Monday, March 16.

div.div: In the Weauwega-Fremont School District, the health, safety and well being of our students and staff are our top priorities.
